📜 Manifesto

As a kid I always looked the explanation for the things that where around me, I always liked to discover new meanings and porpuses for the toys and tools that where at my disposition; Thinking in the posibilitys to solve problems or finding new ways to play, it was just an excuse to create something new that I could enjoyed the whole process of make it real.

So I decided to share with the world the wonderings of a creative mind that could turn code in amazing solutions for the real world problems, because i frimly belive that the passion for doing what you like and what you want, can take you to a incredible places and I'm ready to enjoy the ride.

Now it`s time for me to take a step further to create the new ways of entertaiment of this new generation.

👩🏽‍🚀 Projects

Movil Safe

A complete car alarm sistem that could turn on an off you're car, activate the alarm and lower or close the windows just with a text message and also notify you for a trigger on the alarm. Future Android app for optimization on the respond time and the user UI.
